meanings.sent1: I neese when I have a cold.
meanings.sent2: People neese when they have allergies.
meanings.sent3: The cat made me neese with all its fur.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden neese startled everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The loud neese echoed through the quiet library.

meanings.sent1: After the neese, she grabbed a tissue.

meanings.sent4: The neese sounded like a tiny explosion.
